Post Status

The Post Status newsletter is a free weekly newsletter for WordPress professionals from all walks of life. 
You can see what it’s like by looking at our past issues.




Subscribe to the Post Status Newsletter
Every week, the Post Status team puts together the best news and analysis in the WordPress ecosystem and sends it straight to your inbox.

Your email*

CommentsThis field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.
  








Δ







The Post Status newsletter offers:
Weekly news digests, interviews, and analysis from the professional WordPress ecosystem.The latest Post Status Live and Get Hired webinars; Draft, Comment, and Excerpt podcasts.A roundup of the latest Job Listings from the best employers in the WordPress space.New tips, insights, project notices, and community events in WordPress and webtech communities.A roundup of the best new podcast episodes and videos other than our own.
If you’re looking for the Club Membership, you can see all benefits and join here.



I don't usually read email newsletters but I opened the one from @post_status and clicked half the links. Nice work @Krogsgard— Siobhan McKeown (@SiobhanPMcKeown) February 17, 2014


.@post_status your weekly email newsletter is actually enjoyable. The thumbnail & custom description do a great job. Keep it up!— Grant Landram (@GrantLandram) February 16, 2014


Do yourself a favor and subscribe to  @post_status newsletter to stay on top of WordPress news! http://t.co/kGPhqzkj1B cc @Krogsgard— Tina Kesova (@tinakesova) February 17, 2014


Floored by how extensive this @post_status newsletter is. Mad props to @krogsgard! http://t.co/15YIXaKr3l #WordPress— @[email protected] “parody” (@jazzs3quence) February 17, 2014
